tweet_text: The Duel was visually a Kurosawa-inspired piece rendered entirely like a black & white film. Spot colors were reserved for lights and lightsabers. The duel itself was incredible. I didn’t know I needed an Artoo unit with a straw hat, until I finished this episode.
